name: Reproduction Prints Fabrics
description:
Selection of gorgeous Reproduction prints

To order, choose the amount from the drop down menu below and then in the notes tell me which colour - A, B etc you would like.

name: Dear Stella fabrics
description:
Zig Zag, Patterned Dots and Queen Annes Lace.

To order, choose the amount from the drop down menu below and then in the notes tell me which colour - A, B etc you would like.

name: Riley Blake - Kensington
description: Fat Quarter bundle - 21 Fat Quarters

name: Alexandra Sampler
description:
Our new Block of the Month quilt is a beautiful sampler quilt made up of 9 pieced and appliquéd blocks.  This quilt is great to make and covers a whole range of techniques for you to learn as well.

Made over 11 months, you will receive you pattern and fabric to make your quilt top.  Binding us also included. 

When is comes to your border fabric you will have the option to select from a couple of colourways and fabrics.  We will let you know these choices before the end of the program for you to choose from.

Cost  $26-00 per month for 11 months - includes all patterns, fabric, border fabric choice and binding.

Size  58" x 58"

name: Welcome Home Quilt pattern
description:
I love scrap quilts and this is a perfect quilt to be using up all those left over favourite bits and pieces you have and don't want to waste.  It's amazing how you can include all sorts of designs into a scrap quilt and it works.

This quilt is 70" x 70" and is also available as a Kit.

name: Welcome Home Quilt Kit
description:
I love scrap quilts and this is a perfect quilt to be using up all those left over favourite bits and pieces you have and don't want to waste.  It's amazing how you can include all sorts of designs into a scrap quilt and it works.

We have put together a Kit and pre cut squares of our favourite fabrics in warm welcoming country colours,for you to make this lovely quilt.  It is a quick quilt to make and you can start sewing straight away. It will be much admired I'm sure.

The Kit includes a pattern, your pre cut squares, borders and binding.

This quilt is 70" x 70" and is also available as a pattern.

name: Mat and Thread Catcher - Gift
description: Are you like me and end up with a mess all over the floor after a while, never quite get all those threads into the bin.  This Sewing Mat and Thread Catcher is great and looks great too. Your sewing machine will look very stylish on this mat.

name: Mat and Thread Catcher - Kit
description:
Are you like me and end up with a mess all over the floor after a while, never quite get all those threads into the bin.  This Sewing Mat and Thread Catcher is great and looks great too. Your sewing machine will look very stylish on this mat.

Very simple to make and saves a lot of cleaning up time.  Great gift to make for a sewing buddy.

Comes as a pattern, a kit or already made up and ready to go.

options.name: Made up and ready to go

name: Mat and Thread Catcher
description:
Are you like me and end up with a mess all over the floor after a while, never quite get all those threads into the bin.  This Sewing Mat and Thread Catcher is great and looks great too. Your sewing machine will look very stylish on this mat.

Very simple to make and saves a lot of cleaning up time.  Great gift to make for a sewing buddy.

Comes as a pattern, a kit or already made up and ready to go.

name: Square in a Square Quilt - Kit
description:
A simple and stunning quilt to make. Suitable for beginners through to the most experienced. A lovely quick project to make.  Great for all styles from brights to vintage.  

Quilt size 72" x 81"

Kit includes pattern, fabric for your quilt top and binding.  The fabrics are a White background with a selection of country red, green, brown, blue prints for the blocks.

Also available as a pattern

name: Square in a Square Quilt
description:
A simple and stunning quilt to make. Suitable for beginners through to the most experienced. A lovely quick project to make.  Great for all styles from brights to vintage.  

Quilt size 72" x 81"

Also available as a Kit.

name: Robyn Pandolph - Notting Hill
description: Fat Quarters - 17 Fat Quarter Bundle

name: Liberty Fields Block of the Month
description:
What a stunning quilt and made up with one of my favourite blocks - the Ohio Star. This quilt measures 79" x 87"

We have taken this quilt from the fantastic book Material Obsession by Sarah Fielke and Kathy Doughty.  Each month you will get the fabric and pattern for each section.  The last month will also include the book Material Obsession - an lovely book filled with inspiration.

Cost $32-00 per month for 12 months.  This includes fabric for your quilt top, binding and the Material Obsessions book.

name: Beginners Class
description:
Come and join us for this fantastic 6 week class where you will learn all the basics of making your quilt top. This will include using a rotary cutter and ruler, sewing a 1/4 inch seam, piecing a variety of patchwork blocks and putting it all together to make your quilt top. 

Class dates      Saturday   24th August, 2013 for six weeks
                                       9:00am - 12:00pm

name: Quilt In A Day Classes
description:
Dates    Saturday 21st September, 2013

Time     9:00am to 5:00pm

Suitable for a beginner through to experienced

Come and join us for a day of sewing where you will be able to make your quilt top in the day.  Yes, finished in the day.  We have worked out the patterns to be completed the quickest and most accurate way so you can start sewing straight away.  Delicious morning tea, lunch and afternoon tea included.

You will have a choice of two quilt patterns and two colourways for each.  

Class fee $120-00 and this includes your pattern, all your fabric for quilt and binding, pre cut and ready for you to sew. 

You also have the option of bringing your own fabric. We will send out the fabric requirements and cutting instructions well before the class date.  The class fee for this option is $60-00.

name: Hexagon Magic
description:
Oh I do love Hexagons and there is something very relaxing making these little beauties.  At this class you will learn how to make them and all the variations they come in.  A great hand sewing class and a project you can take with you anywhere. Make a table runner, cushion or quilt - lots of options. 



Class fee  $35-00

name: Binding Class
description:
Once you have finished piecing and quilting your stunning project, time to sew on the binding. Come and learn how to finish off your quilt with this binding technique and master the mitred corner.  This will give your quilt a crisp finish that you will be proud of. 

Class fee $25-00

name: Disappearing Four Patch Class
description:
Come any join us and make this stunning Disappearing Four Patch quilt.  This quilt is suitable for beginners through to experienced quilters. Be careful, you will be in demand to make this for family and friends once they see your gorgeous quilt.  A Saturday afternoon class 1 - 4pm

Class fee $35-00

name: Chateau Rouge by French General for Moda
description:
Oh my goodness I love these fabrics by French General.   We have bundled them as Fat 1/8th's - with eight fabrics in each bundle.  Each bundle has a different combination of fabrics.

Just gorgeous, buy one set to add to your stash or all five sets will give you a sample of the whole range. 

Each combination is numbered and choose in the drop down menu.

name: Home Is Where Your Story Begins  Table Runner - Kit
description:
A couple of years ago we shouted ourselves a new and larger – 8 seats – dining room table.  It is so nice to fit family and friends around.  I couldn’t find a table runner that seemed to suit this larger table so what else is there to do but make one.  This is such an easy pattern to adjust size wise to fit any table.  The stitchery sums up my feelings on the importance of home and family.

16”  x  24”

Kit includes pattern, fabric and embroidery thread

name: Fabric Greeting Cards
description:
Exclusively to Delbrook, by Here we Go Loopy Lou, are these gorgeous fabric greeting cards. There is something so lovely about someone taking the time to send a with a hand written message.  

The fabric is quilting quality cotton on thick white card with rounded corners and come with quality white (peal and seal) envelopes.

Available in two sizes  12.5 cm x 12.5 cm and a smaller note size of 8 cm x 8 cm.

Four designs available.  Buy a single card or a mixed set of four.

name: Simple Traditions by Kim Diehl
description:
I only have four copies of this stunning book.

It is packed with 14 quilts in the warm signature style of Kim Diehl

name: Introduction To Sewing Class
description:
Are you new to sewing or maybe a bit rusty and wanting a refresher course? This is the class for you. We will take you through the basics of knowing your sewing machine, loading a bobbin, sewing a straight seam, using a rotary cutter and more.  In this class you will make lovely cushion cover with an envelope back.  You can never have too many cushions.  This class will get you started and on your way to sewing and give you the knowledge to venture into other sewing projects, like a quilt.

Class dates      More dates coming soon

Class fee $35-00. This includes your fabric and cushion inner.

Class held in Hastings

name: Once Upon A Time Cot Quilt Kit
description:
36"  x  36"
A sweet simple Cot Quilt for someone very special.  A combination of 4" squares, Ohio Stars and Four Patch blocks. Also makes a lovely change/play mat.

Kit includes pattern, fabric for quilt top and binding

name: Once Upon A Time Cot Quilt
description:
36"  x  36"
A sweet simple Cot Quilt for someone very special.  A combination of 4" squares, Ohio Stars and Four Patch blocks. Also makes a lovely change/play mat.

This pattern could easily be made for a bigger bed.

Also available as a kit.

name: Heart Sewing Kit - Kit
description:
A lovely hold all sewing kit with applique Heart and matching pin cushion. The zipper pockets will keep your scissors, threads, bits and bobs safe and sound. Extra pockets to hold everything else.

10” x 17”

Kit includes pattern, fabric, zippers, woolfelt, button

name: Fat Quarter Pack - Brown & Tan
description: A selection of four Fat Quarters to add to your stash.

name: Autumn Abundance Redwork
description:
Make this lovely quilt over 10 months at $30-00 per month.

A beautiful quilt from Keepsake Quilts featuring botanical redwork blocks.  Joining them together are a combination of blocks - flying geeses, 9 patch, pinwheels, ohio star to name a few.

50"  x  54"

name: Lizzie's Quilt
description:
This quilt was a long labour of love for my best buddy Lizzie.  She loved this range of fabrics and I put them together with a two block pattern. Two blocks together can make a secondary pattern that makes the quilt look more complicated than it actually is.  I love hand quilting so undertook to hand quilt this for Lizzie – hmmmmmm not a quick process but the important thing is she loves it and that is why we make quilts.

68”  x  68”

name: Basket & Blooms Wall-hanging
description:
A lovely long Wall-hanging featuring daisies & baskets.  

11”  x  40”

name: Around The Block
description: Jessie has made this quilt in two soft muted colours and makes a lovely antique looking quilt. It works just as well made from a large selection of scrap fabrics for centres and surrounds, brights, children’s prints and more. 58” x 63” Also available as a kit.

name: Foxgloves and Hollyhocks Wall-hanging
description:
Here are some of our favourite flowers all in one little quilt with some baskets, berries and bits and bobs.

26”  x  31”

name: Carolina Homestead Block of the Month
description:
One of the best things about a Block of the Month Quilt is that you get fun mail once a month - yay. You will make this lovely quilt over 6 months @ $40-00 per month. This includes patterns, fabric and binding.

This beautiful quilt is made up of a combination of pieced blocks – Sawtooth Stars, and applique.  

56”  x  56”

name: Kitchen What Not
description:
A handy kitchen wall hanging to hold your essentials – cookbooks, magazines, and spatulas – all with in easy reach when you are busy creating in the kitchen.  This could also be used in your sewing room to hold your magazines and patterns.

13”  x  34”

name: Jess’s Birthday Wall-hanging
description:
Pretty florals, lacy doilies, buttons, ribbon and lace – beautiful.

14”  x  26”

name: Olfa Rotary Cutter 45mm
description: 45mm Olfa Rotary Cutter – suitable for both left and right handed

name: Olfa 45mm Blade
description: 45 mm Olfa Rotary Cutter Blade – 1 Blade in a Plastic Case

name: Olfa Rotary Cutter 28mm
description: Suitable for both left and right handed.

name: Olfa 28mm Blade
description: 28 mm Olfa Rotary Cutter Blade -  2 Blades in a Plastic Case

name: Roxanne Glue Baste-It
description: This is a fantastic glue that I use for Needleturn Applique.  The syringe applicator delivers small dots of glue exactly where you need them.  Holds very well  100% water soluble.

name: Pigma Pen 01 Black
description: Use to transfer designs for Stitchery patterns. Fine tip permanent pen.

name: Pigma Pen	 01 Brown
description: Use to transfer designs for Stitchery patterns. Fine tip permanent pen.

name: A Stitch In TIme Needlecase - Kit
description:
This lovely Needlecase combines stitchery, ric rac, easy piecing and wool felt – great combination.  Will keep those pesky needles safe and sound.

8”  x  8” 

Kit includes pattern, fabric, woolfelt, ric rac, threads

name: Hexagon Sewing Bag
description: There is something a little bit “pat on the back” about making hexagons. The thought of hand piecing something can be a bit daunting but it is actually quite relaxing and you can take them with you wherever you go and stitch away. This little bag is great for carrying your sewing bits and bobs. Could also make a lovely stitchery project bag or even a make up bag. If you want to make it a deeper bag, just add more rows or change the size of the bag by making the hexagons larger or smaller. Also available as a kit.

name: Hexagon Sewing Bag - Kit
description: There is something a little bit “pat on the back” about making hexagons.  The thought of hand piecing something can be a bit daunting but it is actually quite relaxing and you can take them with you wherever you go and stitch away.  This little bag is great for carrying your sewing bits and bobs.  Could also make a lovely stitchery project bag or even a make up bag.  If you want to make it a deeper bag, just add more rows or change the size of the bag by making the hexagons larger or smaller.

name: Mama's Nine Patch
description: My Mum, Pat, had a collection of 5” squares and this is the gorgeous quilt she made with them. What a simple and stunning quilt it makes. You can use just nine fabrics and make each block the same or use a bigger selection to make a scrappy quilt. A very good pattern for a guys quilt too. We have used 42 fabrics twice. Endless possibilities. 57” x 57” Also available as a kit.

name: Wool Felt Sewing Kit - Pattern
description: A lovely wool felt hold all sewing kit with applique basket and matching pin cushion. The zipper pockets will keep your scissors, threads, bits and bobs safe and sound. Extra pockets to hold everything else. 10” x 17” Also available as a kit.

name: Becka's Quilt
description:
A few years ago I had went to the States on a quilting tour – fantastic time.  One of the places we went to was the New England Quilt Museum in Lowell, MA.  They had an exhibition of World War I and II quilts at the time and it was stunning.  This is where I picked up the fabric in the main square of this quilt and I had been holding onto it all this time.  Then in came to me and I made this quilt for my darling Becka – it’s a simple quilt but one that can show off a special piece of fabric.  It’s a cinch of a quilt to change size – just add more Squares and 16 Patch Blocks.

55”  x  55”

name: Wool Felt Sewing Kit - Kit
description:
A lovely wool felt hold all sewing kit with applique basket and matching pin cushion.  The zipper pockets will keep your scissors, threads, bits and bobs safe and sound.  Extra pockets to hold everything else.  

10”  x  17”

Kit includes pattern, fabric, woolfelt, zippers and threads

name: Heart Sewing Kit - Pattern
description: A lovely hold all sewing kit with applique Heart and matching pin cushion. The zipper pockets will keep your scissors, threads, bits and bobs safe and sound. Extra pockets to hold everything else. 10” x 17” Also available as a kit.

name: Jessie's Carry All Bag Kit
description:
This is a lovely bag that has many uses – everyday hand bag, good size bag for carrying your quilting projects or deep enough to make a great knitting bag.  So easy and quick why not make one for each purpose.

18”  x  18”

Kit includes pattern, fabric, lace, ribbon & ric rac.  Handles not included.

name: Jessie's Carry All Bag
description: This is a lovely bag that has many uses – everyday hand bag, good size bag for carrying your quilting projects or deep enough to make a great knitting bag. So easy and quick why not make one for each purpose. 18” x 18” Also available as a kit.

name: Makes Me Happy
description:
I do have a love of plaids, checks and hearts.  My friend Lizzie designed this quilt with that in mind and it makes me smile every time I see it – especially as she describes her style as “happy sewing” – love it.  Of course you can use whatever combination or style of fabric that makes you smile.

72”  x  96”

name: Square and Four Patch Kit
description:
This is a quilt that you would be able to make and complete in a weekend.  Often it is hard to find patterns that can be for a guy so we have made our sample in muted brown, tan  & red.  Change your fabric to pretty florals, brights or use up your every growing stash and you have a quilt that suits every occasion. Also very easy to make bigger, just add more Squares and 4 Patch Blocks – perfect.

58”  x  66”

Kit includes pattern, fabric for quilt top and binding.

name: Square and Four Patch
description: This is a quilt that you would be able to make and complete in a weekend. Often it is hard to find patterns that can be for a guy so we have made our sample in muted brown, tan & red. Change your fabric to pretty florals, brights or use up your every growing stash and you have a quilt that suits every occasion. Also very easy to make bigger, just add more Squares and 4 Patch Blocks – perfect. 58” x 66” Also available as a kit.

You can use just nine fabrics and make each block the same or use a bigger selection to make a scrappy quilt. A very good pattern for a guys quilt too. Endless possibilities.

57”  x  57”

Kit includes pattern, fabric for quilt top and binding

58”  x  63”

name: Wool Felt Bucket Bag Kit
description:
Wool felt, flowers and buzzy bees - this is a cute quirky little bag that you could use for so many things – a handbag, a sewing kit, project bag, knitting kit and more.  

7”  x   7”

Kit includes wool felt, fabric, threads and pattern

name: Wool Felt Bucket Bag
description: Wool felt, flowers and buzzy bees - this is a cute quirky little bag that you could use for so many things – a handbag, a sewing kit, project bag, knitting kit and more. 7” x 7” Also available as a kit.

name: Home Is Where Your Story Begins  Table Runner
description:
A couple of years ago we shouted ourselves a new and larger – 8 seats – dining room table.  It is so nice to fit family and friends around.  I couldn’t find a table runner that seemed to suit this larger table so what else is there to do but make one.  This is such an easy pattern to adjust size wise to fit any table.  The stitchery sums up my feelings on the importance of home and family.

16”  x  24”

name: Sometimes Stitchery Kit
description:
A friend bought me a cute little wooden plaque with this saying on it.  I loved it.  With the mad busy lives that we all have, it is a lovely reminder that sometimes we just need to take a break and breathe ........

16 ½”  x  19 ½”

Kit includes pattern, fabric and threads

name: Sometimes Stitchery
description: A friend bought me a cute little wooden plaque with this saying on it. I loved it. With the mad busy lives that we all have, it is a lovely reminder that sometimes we just need to take a break and breathe ........ 16 ½” x 19 ½” Also available as a kit.

name: Jessie's Bag Kit
description:
A quick and cute bag to make made up of assorted 3’ squares.  Quilted as you go for a quick and easy project.

12” x 10 ½”

Kit includes pattern, fabric & batting. Handles not included.

name: Visiting Lancaster I
description: A few years ago I went on a Quilt Tour to the States – I know, how exciting. One of my favourite parts we visited was Lancaster PA, Amish country. I have made a three series set of quilts that remind me of the simple beautiful quilts that we saw at the road side shops. 45” x 45” Also available as a kit.

name: Hollyhock Sewing Kit - Kit
description:
Woolfelt and Ticking – two of my favourite things.  Put this all together into a gorgeous little sewing kit to keep your thimble, needles, scissors, threads and more together – perfect.

6 ½” square -  6 ½”  x  13” when open

Kit includes pattern, fabric & woolfelt, batting, threads.

name: Jessie's Bag
description: A quick and cute bag to make made up of assorted 3’ squares. Quilted as you go for a quick and easy project. 12” x 10 ½” Also available as a kit.

name: Oklahoma Prairie
description:
Start this beautiful quilt with a wreath and build around with baskets.  Then finish off with a floral border.  Stunning.

55”  x  55”

name: Wool & Roses Bag
description:
This is a lovely, stylish handbag to make.  The Fast to Fuse stiffening can be hard to find sometimes so you can swap this for batting if you want.  It is the quilting of the Wool Felt that help make it stand up.  In a short amount of time you will have a lovely bag made that will be much admired.

13”  x  13”
